# braintrustdata_api_key (Data Source)

Reads a Braintrust API key by `id` or by API-native searchable attributes (`name`, optionally `org_name`).

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Read an API key by ID
data "braintrustdata_api_key" "by_id" {
  id = "api-key-123"
}

# Read an API key by name with optional organization filter
data "braintrustdata_api_key" "by_name" {
  name     = "service-key"
  org_name = "example-org"
}

output "api_key_id" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_api_key.by_name.id
}

output "api_key_preview" {
  value = data.braintrustdata_api_key.by_name.preview_name
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the API key. Specify either `id` or `name`.
- `name` (String) The API key name. Can be used as a searchable attribute when `id` is not provided.
- `org_name` (String) Optional organization name filter applied during searchable lookups.

### Read-Only

- `created` (String) The timestamp when the API key was created.
- `org_id` (String) The organization ID that the API key belongs to.
- `preview_name` (String) The preview name of the API key.
- `user_email` (String) The email of the user who created the API key.
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user who created the API key.
